name: Space Station Loma: OPERATIONS
description: You alone are responsible for the maintenance of a space station. If you were looking for a non platform defense game in VR, you found it in this fast paced “space station explosion simulator”. How hard can it be to push some buttons, eh?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64bit) Processor: Intel i5-4670 3.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: not needed, but makes it a lot more easier to play
